description.name: Halloween
description.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois, to kill again.

description.name: The Shining
description.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

description.name: Carrie
description.description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

description.name: Jaws
description.description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

description.name: The Exorcist
description.description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

description.name: Poltergeist
description.description: A family's home becomes the center of paranormal activity that opens a doorway to the "other side." With help, they must cross over to get their daughter back.

description.name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
description.description: Five friends head out to rural Texas to visit the grave of a grandfather. On the way they stumble across what appears to be a deserted house, only to discover something sinister within. Something armed with a chainsaw.

description.name: Alien
description.description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

description.name: Cape Fear
description.description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

description.name: Psycho
description.description: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

description.name: Friday the 13th
description.description: A group of teenage camp counselors attempt to re-open an abandoned summer camp with a tragic past, but they are stalked by a mysterious, relentless killer.

description.name: Predator
description.description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

description.name: It
description.description: In 1960, seven pre-teen outcasts fight an evil demon who poses as a child-killing clown. Thirty years later, they reunite to stop the demon once and for all when it returns to their hometown.

description.name: The Thing
description.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

description.name: Night of the Living Dead
description.description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

description.name: Gremlins
description.description: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

description.name: The Evil Dead
description.description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

description.name: The Sixth Sense
description.description: After being shot by a resentful former patient whom he failed to help, a Philadelphia child psychologist seeks redemption by treating a young boy with a disturbing secret.

description.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description.description: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth concealed by her parents after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer with a bladed glove in their dreams, in which if they die, it kills them in rea...

description.name: The Birds
description.description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

description.name: It
description.description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

description.name: Army of Darkness
description.description: When Ash Williams is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead in order to return home.

description.name: The Omen
description.description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

description.name: Saw
description.description: Two men awaken to find themselves on the opposite sides of a dead body, each with specific instructions to kill the other or face consequences. These two are the latest victims of the Jigsaw Killer.

description.name: Rosemary's Baby
description.description: A young couple trying for a baby moves into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, where they find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

description.name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
description.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

description.name: They Live
description.description: They influence our decisions without us knowing it. They numb our senses without us feeling it. They control our lives without us realizing it. They live.

description.name: Misery
description.description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

description.name: The Mist
description.description: After a massive thunderstorm, an eerie, unwavering fog descends upon a Maine community. Locals seek refuge in a grocery store from the monstrous creatures now roaming the countryside killing everyone they encounter.

description.name: Dawn of the Dead
description.description: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

description.name: Child's Play
description.description: A dying serial killer transfers his consciousness into a popular kids doll using voodoo. A struggling single mother gifts her six-year-old son the much sought-after doll for his birthday, and the doll slowly begins to show its tru...

description.name: Pet Sematary
description.description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

description.name: Fire in the Sky
description.description: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.

description.name: El laberinto del fauno
description.description: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

description.name: The Amityville Horror
description.description: Newlyweds and their children battle a demonic presence in their home.

description.name: The Devil's Rejects
description.description: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

description.name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
description.description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

description.name: Planet Terror
description.description: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

description.name: Event Horizon
description.description: A rescue crew is tasked with investigating the mysterious reappearance of a spaceship that had been lost for seven years.

description.name: Frankenstein
description.description: Dr Henry Frankenstein is obsessed with assembling a living being from parts of several exhumed corpses.

description.name: Dracula
description.description: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

description.name: The Wolf Man
description.description: Upon his return to his father's estate, aristocrat Larry Talbot meets a beautiful woman, attends a mystical carnival and uncovers a horrifying curse.

description.name: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
description.description: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

description.name: Split
description.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

description.name: The Haunting
description.description: Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.

description.name: The Fly
description.description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

description.name: Arachnophobia
description.description: A new species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to a California town in a coffin and starts to breed, leaving a trail of deaths that puzzle and terrify young Dr. Ross Jennings, who is newly arrived in town with his fa...

description.name: Cujo
description.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

description.name: Hellraiser
description.description: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law and lover. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body and escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their underworld.

description.name: Nosferatu, eine Symphonie des Grauens
description.description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

description.name: The Lost Boys
description.description: When a recently divorced mother and her two teenage boys move to a coastal town to stay with her father, it doesn't take long for the brothers to realize the area is a haven for something much more sinister than party-going surfers.

description.name: An American Werewolf in London
description.description: American college students David Kessler and Jack Goodman on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists. Jack dies. David recovers in a hospital, where he has nightmares.

description.name: Tremors
description.description: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

description.name: Insidious
description.description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

description.name: The Phantom of the Opera
description.description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

description.name: From Hell
description.description: After five ritualistic murders are committed in 1888 London, Inspector Abberline's assignment is to investigate the "Jack the Ripper" murders. Along with a string of mutilated prostitutes, he uncovers a conspiracy involving the go...

description.name: Dawn of the Dead
description.description: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

description.name: Hostel
description.description: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

description.name: The Hills Have Eyes
description.description: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

description.name: Creature from the Black Lagoon
description.description: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

description.name: Lake Placid
description.description: Four people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

description.name: Candyman
description.description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

description.name: Braindead
description.description: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

description.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
description.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

description.name: Black Christmas
description.description: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

description.name: Vampires
description.description: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

description.name: Jeepers Creepers
description.description: A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.

description.name: From Dusk Till Dawn
description.description: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

description.name: The Fog
description.description: Local legend tells of a ship lured on to the rocks of Antonio Bay being enveloped by a supernatural cloud as it sank; the myth says that when this mysterious fog returns, the victims will rise up from the depths seeking vengeance.

description.name: House on Haunted Hill
description.description: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

description.name: The Howling
description.description: After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

description.name: The Blair Witch Project
description.description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

description.name: Re-Animator
description.description: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

description.name: Children of the Corn
description.description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

title: 75. The Last House on the Left

description.name: The Last House on the Left
description.description: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.

description.name: Shaun of the Dead
description.description: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

description.name: The Ghost and the Darkness
description.description: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

description.name: Frailty
description.description: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

description.name: Let Me In
description.description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

description.name: Village of the Damned
description.description: In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.

description.name: Fright Night
description.description: "Fright Night" sees a teenager believing that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire. He turns to an actor in a television hosted horror movie show for help to deal with the undead.

description.name: The Wicker Man
description.description: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

description.name: 28 Days Later
description.description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the United Kingdom, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

description.name: Teeth
description.description: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

description.name: The Blob
description.description: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

description.name: Paranormal Activity
description.description: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

description.name: The Ring
description.description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

description.name: Orphan
description.description: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

description.name: The Descent
description.description: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

description.name: Suspiria
description.description: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

description.name: Creepshow
description.description: Five grisly tales from a kid's comic book about a murdered father rising from his grave, a bizarre meteor, a vengeful husband, a mysterious crate's occupant, and a plague of cockroaches.

description.name: Slither
description.description: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

description.name: Zombieland
description.description: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

description.name: Scanners
description.description: A scientist trains a man with an advanced telepathic ability called "scanning" to stop a dangerous Scanner with extraordinary psychic powers from waging war against non scanners.

description.name: Phantasm
description.description: Newly orphaned teenager Mike Pearson, his older brother Jody, and their friends face off against a mysterious grave robber known as the Tall Man, who employs a lethal arsenal of unearthly weapons in their southern California town.

description.name: Species
description.description: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

description.name: Critters
description.description: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

description.name: Cabin Fever
description.description: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

description.name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
description.description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

description.name: The Uninvited
description.description: A composer and his sister discover that the reason they are able to purchase a beautiful gothic seacoast mansion very cheaply is the house's unsavory past.

description.name: Halloween
description.description: After being committed for 15 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

title: 102. What We Do in the Shadows

description.name: What We Do in the Shadows
description.description: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

description.name: Day of the Dead
description.description: As the world is overrun by zombies, a group of scientists and military personnel sheltering in an underground bunker in Florida must decide on how they should deal with the undead horde.

description.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description.description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the city's residents one body at a time.

description.name: Frenzy
description.description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

description.name: Get Out
description.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

description.name: The Conjuring
description.description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

description.name: Tales from the Crypt
description.description: Five strangers get lost in a crypt and, after meeting the mysterious Crypt Keeper, receive visions of how they will die.

description.name: The Babadook
description.description: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

description.name: The Mummy
description.description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he believes to be his long-lost princess.

description.name: Quarantine
description.description: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

description.name: Tideland
description.description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

description.name: Pumpkinhead
description.description: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

description.name: The Hitcher
description.description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

description.name: ...E tu vivrai nel terrore! L'aldilà
description.description: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

description.name: Christine
description.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

description.name: Final Destination
description.description: After getting a premonition about a plane crash on his school trip, Alex, a student, saves a few of his classmates. However, their situation gets complicated when death starts chasing them.

description.name: Ghoulies
description.description: A young man and his girlfriend move into an old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a desire to control ancient demons.

description.name: Idle Hands
description.description: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

description.name: The Monster Squad
description.description: A group of 12-year-olds form a Universal Monsters fan club called Monster Squad, and have to attempt to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters when they show up for real.

description.name: Snakes on a Plane
description.description: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

description.name: Thinner
description.description: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

description.name: [Rec]
description.description: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

description.name: Dead Silence
description.description: After his wife meets a grisly end, Jamie Ashen returns to his haunted hometown of Ravens Fair to find answers. His investigation leads him to the ghost of a ventriloquist named Mary Shaw who seems to have ties to his entire family...

description.name: Children of the Damned
description.description: Six impossibly intelligent children from all over the world with dangerous psychic powers hide in a church in England after the military tries to experiment on them. Besieged, they warn the military to back off before carnage ensues.

description.name: It Follows
description.description: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

description.name: The Grudge
description.description: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

description.name: Sleepwalkers
description.description: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

description.name: Dark Skies
description.description: As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars.

description.name: Leprechaun
description.description: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.

description.name: Tales from the Hood
description.description: A funeral director tells four strange tales of horror with an African American focus to three drug dealers he traps in his place of business.

description.name: The Midnight Meat Train
description.description: A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways.

description.name: The Strangers
description.description: James Hoyt and Kristen McKay visit an isolated vacation home to enjoy some time together. However, they are in for a rude surprise when three masked assailants make their stay a nightmare.

description.name: The Cabin in the Woods
description.description: A group of kids go to a remote cabin in the woods where their fate is unknowingly controlled by technicians as part of a world-wide conspiracy where all horror movie clichés are revealed to be part of an elaborate sacrifice ritual.

description.name: The Boogey Man
description.description: Through the reflection in the mirror, a girl witnesses her mother's boyfriend's murder.

description.name: The Last Exorcism
description.description: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

description.name: The Fourth Kind
description.description: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

title: 138. The Last House on the Left

description.name: The Last House on the Left
description.description: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge...

description.name: Dog Soldiers
description.description: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scottish wilderness.

description.name: Salem's Lot
description.description: A novelist and a young horror fan attempt to save a small New England town which has been invaded by vampires.

description.name: Bug
description.description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

description.name: The Purge
description.description: A wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

description.name: Frozen
description.description: Three skiers stranded on a chairlift are forced to make life-or-death choices, which prove more perilous than staying put and freezing to death.

description.name: The Crazies
description.description: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

description.name: Deliverance
description.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

description.name: Blood
description.description: 20 years ago, Carl was responsible for genetically engineering a girl with narcotic blood. Now he's brought her home - and the boundaries between love and addiction are becoming increasingly blurred.

description.name: Deep Blue Sea
description.description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

description.name: Gwoemul
description.description: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

description.name: Mirrors
description.description: Ben guards a partly-destroyed property by night but begins to see strange images in its impeccable mirrors. After his sister is killed, he is convinced that evil forces are out to get him.

description.name: I tre volti della paura
description.description: Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories about a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.

description.name: Ginger Snaps
description.description: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

description.name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
description.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

description.name: Monkey Shines
description.description: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

description.name: The Gift
description.description: A married couple, Simon and Robyn, run into Gordo, an old classmate. Things take a turn when Gordo begins to drop in unannounced at their house and inundates them with mysterious gifts.

description.name: La maschera del demonio
description.description: Decades after being executed for witchcraft, vengeful Princess Asa Vajda and her fiendish servant are resurrected and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of Asa Vajda's beautiful look-alike descendant Princess Katia.

description.name: The Changeling
description.description: After experiencing tragic personal losses, a music professor rents a Seattle mansion, haunted by a slain boy.

description.name: Case 39
description.description: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she expected.

description.name: Cat's Eye
description.description: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

description.name: Phenomena
description.description: A young girl who has an amazing ability to communicate with insects is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.

description.name: The Bride of Frankenstein
description.description: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Baron Henry Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

description.name: Angmareul boatda
description.description: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

description.name: The Good Son
description.description: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and becomes friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

description.name: White Dog
description.description: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

description.name: You're Next
description.description: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

description.name: Wolfen
description.description: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

description.name: Tusk
description.description: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

description.name: The Girl Next Door
description.description: In a quiet suburban town in the summer of 1958, two recently orphaned sisters are placed in the care of their mentally unstable Aunt Ruth. But Ruth's depraved sense of discipline will soon lead to unspeakable acts of abuse and tor...

description.name: Tesis
description.description: While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

description.name: Dellamorte dellamore
description.description: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

description.name: Zombi 2
description.description: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

description.name: The Faculty
description.description: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

description.name: It Comes at Night
description.description: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

description.name: El día de la bestia
description.description: Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there st...

description.name: The Entity
description.description: A woman is tormented by an invisible being.

description.name: The Attic
description.description: A librarian devotes her life to caring for her wheelchair-bound tyrannical father after being stood up at the altar. She fantasizes about causing deaths of the men who most wronged her and finds joy only with her pet monkey. Her m...

description.name: The Devils
description.description: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

title: 177. Burial Ground: The Nights of Terror

description.name: Le notti del terrore
description.description: An archaeology professor discovers an ancient crypt which contains living dead corpses. The zombies go on a rampage and attack a group of people which the professor had invited to celebrate his discovery.

description.name: Dead End
description.description: Christmas Eve. On his way to his in-laws with his family, Frank Harrington decides to try a shortcut, for the first time in 20 years. It turns out to be the biggest mistake of his life.

description.name: Pandorum
description.description: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.

description.name: The Vault of Horror
description.description: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

description.name: Firestarter
description.description: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

description.name: Nattevagten
description.description: A law student starts working as a night watchman at The Department of Forensic Medicine in Copenhagen. His mad friend gets him on a game of dare that escalates. As a serial-killer's victims start piling up at work, he becomes a su...

description.name: Shutter
description.description: When Jane and Tun run over a girl in a car accident, they speed away immediately from the crime scene. However, Tun, a photographer, soon discovers strange shadows in his photos, which unsettles them.

description.name: Haute tension
description.description: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

description.name: Shivers
description.description: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are infected by parasites that turn them into mindless nymphomaniac fiends.

description.name: Ghost Ship
description.description: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

description.name: The Cellar Door
description.description: The girl next door, having coffee, lunch with a friend, shopping, unaware she is becoming an obsession. She has been chosen. A young woman awakes to find herself imprisoned in a serial killer's basement. She is not the first to be...

description.name: Maniac Cop
description.description: A killer dressed in a police uniform begins murdering innocent people on the streets of New York City.

description.name: Gutterballs
description.description: A bowling night will turn into a bloody death match for a team of teenagers, as a deranged serial killer is taking them down one by one.

description.name: Eraserhead
description.description: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newborn mutant child.

description.name: Videodrome
description.description: A programmer at a Toronto TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

description.name: Prom Night
description.description: At a high-school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

description.name: Wishmaster
description.description: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

description.name: Sinister
description.description: A controversial true-crime writer finds a box of Super 8 home movies in his new home, revealing that the murder case he is currently researching could be the work of an unknown serial killer whose legacy dates back to the 1960s.

description.name: 13 Ghosts
description.description: A family inherits a house with 12 ghosts who want a 13th.

description.name: Låt den rätte komma in
description.description: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

description.name: The Stepfather
description.description: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

description.name: Dracula
description.description: When Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula for accepting a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, his friend Dr. Van Helsing pursues the predatory villain.

description.name: The Helpers
description.description: Seven friends on a road trip break down near a rest-stop motel, where they encounter a seemingly helpful group of people. Convinced to stay overnight, the friends wake up in their rooms to a gruesome and bloody terror.

description.name: House of Wax
description.description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

description.name: Green Room
description.description: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

description.name: The Houses October Built
description.description: Five friends are stalked by a group of mysterious and disturbed individuals while on a road trip looking for the ultimate haunted house attraction.

description.name: Drag Me to Hell
description.description: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

description.name: Atrocious
description.description: Two teenage siblings endure a terrifying experience while investigating a rural legend near their family's vacation home.

title: 205. What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?

description.name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
description.description: A former vaudeville child star torments her paraplegic sister, who eclipsed her as a movie star, in their decaying Hollywood mansion while desperately clinging to hopes of a comeback.

description.name: The Bad Seed
description.description: Rhoda Penmark seems like your average, sweet eight-year-old girl. After her rival at school dies in mysterious circumstances at the school picnic, her mother starts to suspect that Rhoda was responsible.

description.name: The Dead Zone
description.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee future events.

description.name: Fallen
description.description: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

description.name: The House of the Devil
description.description: In 1983, financially struggling college student Samantha Hughes takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret, putting her life in mortal danger.

description.name: Cat People
description.description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

description.name: Night of the Demons
description.description: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

description.name: El orfanato
description.description: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

description.name: Gin gwai
description.description: A blind girl gets a cornea transplant so that she will be able to see again. She gets more than she bargained for upon realizing she can also see ghosts.

description.name: Constantine
description.description: Detective Angela approaches Constantine, a demon hunter, to help her investigate her twin sister's mysterious death. As he digs deeper, he realizes that demons are trying to enter the human world.

description.name: Intruder
description.description: The overnight stock crew of a local supermarket find themselves being stalked and slashed by a mysterious maniac.

description.name: Prince of Darkness
description.description: A group of graduate students and scientists uncover an ancient canister in an abandoned church, but when they open the container, they inadvertently unleash a strange liquid and an evil force on all humanity.

description.name: Pontypool
description.description: A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.

description.name: The Others
description.description: In 1945, immediately following the end of Second World War, a woman who lives with her two photosensitive children on her darkened old family estate in the Channel Islands becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

description.name: Ju-on
description.description: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.

description.name: The Fall of the House of Usher
description.description: Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.

description.name: Attack the Block
description.description: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

description.name: The Dentist
description.description: An extremely successful dentist goes off the deep end after he catches his wife cheating on him.

description.name: Grave
description.description: A young woman, studying to be a vet, develops a craving for human flesh.

description.name: Hell Night
description.description: Four college fraternity and sorority pledges spend the night in a deserted old mansion as part of a hazing ritual during hell night, where they are stalked by the only survivor of a family massacre from the mansion's sordid past.

description.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description.description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

title: 226. A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

description.name: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
description.description: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

description.name: Death of a Ghost Hunter
description.description: Renowned "ghost hunter", Carter Simms is paid to conduct a paranormal investigation of a supposedly haunted house. Along with a cameraman, a reporter, and a spiritual advocate, she embarks on a three night journey into terror.

description.name: Il racconto dei racconti - Tale of Tales
description.description: From the bitter quest of the Queen of Longtrellis, to two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king, to the King of Highhills obsessed with a giant Flea, these tales are inspired by the fairytales by Giambattista Basile.

description.name: Session 9
description.description: Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.

description.name: Theatre of Blood
description.description: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

description.name: The Invitation
description.description: When a man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, the unsettling past reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

description.name: Ringu
description.description: When her niece is found dead along with three friends after viewing a supposedly cursed videotape, reporter Reiko sets out to investigate. She finds the tape, watches it and receives a phone call informing her that she'll die in a...

description.name: Open Water
description.description: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

description.name: Grace
description.description: After losing her unborn child, Madeline Matheson insists on carrying the baby to term. Following the delivery, the child miraculously returns to life with an appetite for human blood. Madeline is faced with a mother's ultimate dec...

description.name: Freaks
description.description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist Cleopatra agrees to marry Hans the leader of side-show performers, but Hans' deformed friends discover that she is only marrying him for his inheritance. So they seek revenge.

description.name: The Loved Ones
description.description: When Brent turns down his classmate Lola's invitation to the prom, she concocts a wildly violent plan for revenge.

description.name: Amusement
description.description: Three women are stalked by a killer with a grudge that extends back to the girls' childhoods.

description.name: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
description.description: An isolated Puritan family in 1630s New England comes unraveled by the forces of witchcraft and possession.

description.name: Happy Death Day
description.description: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

description.name: The Thing from Another World
description.description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

description.name: Little Shop of Horrors
description.description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

description.name: Burnt Offerings
description.description: A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.

description.name: Guyver
description.description: Young man merges with mechanical device, becoming cyborg superhero. Strange creatures emerge, seeking to reclaim device. He uncovers plot to genetically engineer monstrous creatures.

description.name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
description.description: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

description.name: I Walked with a Zombie
description.description: A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner, who has been acting strangely, on a Caribbean island.

description.name: Lake Mungo
description.description: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

description.name: The Rite
description.description: American seminary student Michael Kovak travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

description.name: Hereditary
description.description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

description.name: Midsommar
description.description: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

description.name: Das Cabinet des Dr. Caligari
description.description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.
